metadata.title: CVE-2020-28595 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the Obj.cpp load_obj()functionality of Prusa Research PrusaSlicer 2.2.0 and Master (commit4b040b856). A specially crafted obj file can lead to code execution. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
